scripts.rm: rm dist/*.js dist/*.d.ts 2>/dev/null || echo && rmdir dist/src/ 2>/dev/null || echo && rm src/*.js src/*.d.ts 2>/dev/null || echo
scripts.transpile: babel --copy-files -q -f src/*.js -d dist/ && mv dist/src/* dist/ && rmdir dist/src/ && cp src/*.d.ts dist/
scripts.g: npm run rm && npm run compile && npm run transpile && npm run preprocess
